sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A word of councel to the disaffected.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for Francis Tyton, London : 1651.
Verse - "Will ye not fear? hath not th' Almighty shown". In fact three poems, the others entitled: "To the same, upon the Scots recantation" and "To the same about Engaging." Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan 9th 1650"; the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
A word of councel to the disaffected.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for Francis Tyton, London : 1651.
Verse - "Will ye not fear? hath not th' Almighty shown". In fact three poems, the others entitled: "To the same, upon the Scots recantation" and "To the same about Engaging." Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan 9th 1650"; the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Francis Tyton
